text: Montfavergier was a municipality in the district of Franches-Montagnes in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipality of Montfavergier merged into the municipality of Montfaucon.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Jura
title: Montfavergier
